CreateTaskSubtitle: Fill in the task details to get started. Specify the name, description, and select a team.
TaskNameHint: A short and clear name, up to 50 characters (e.g., 'Develop homepage').
DescriptionHint: Provide a detailed description to help the assignee understand the task (up to 500 characters).
TeamHint: Choose the team that will work on this task. Only teams from this project are available.
PriorityHint: Indicate how urgent the task is.
StatusHint: Set the initial status of the task.
